title: Touch
overview: SLAYED.com wants you to imagine what its like when two girls TOUCH. This series gets you intimate with what happens when girlfriends become ultra-close. Featured cover girls Kenna James and Charlotte Stokely are elegant ladies, so how do these blondes fit in their fun? A pillow fight gets them loosened up, then they take the action in a more decadent direction. Skye Blue and Freya Parker, Jada Stevens and Goddess Guzman, and Izzy Lush and Aidra Fox are all taking girl-on-girl to frisky new heights. Stunning sets, enticing encounters, and performances that will make your pulse race: cuddle up with SLAYED.com and keep in TOUCH.
